agent: Instructions Generator

Take the information below and generate an agent instruction .md file for it in the /docs directory. If a .md filename is provided, use that, otherwise generate and appropriate filename based on the content. Make sure the instructions are concise and not too long. Make sure to update the AGENTS.md file to reference this new docs file. If no information is provided below, prompt the user to give the necessary detail about the layer of architecture or coding standards to document.
